item.title: LEGO Fortnite Brick Life announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/lego-fortnite-brick-life-announced

LEGO Fortnite will add a new “social role-playing experience” called LEGO Fortnite Brick Life on December 12, Epic Games announced.

The base LEGO Fortnite game will also be renamed to LEGO Fortnite Odyssey, coinciding with the “Storm Chasers” update due out on December 10. The update will also add a new biome, dungeons, enemies, items, and boss.

Here is an overview of LEGO Fortnite Brick Life, via Epic Games:

Make new friends, explore the sights, land your dream job, and move into your new home in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life! It’s an all-new social role-play experience in the LEGO Fortnite universe, launching on December 12!

Wondering where you need to go to start your city life? When you head into Discover, you’ll now find LEGO Fortnite listed as its own unique category within Fortnite.

There, you’ll find LEGO Fortnite Brick Life, as well as LEGO Fortnite Odyssey (the original LEGO Fortnite experience, now with all-new features, characters, an electrifying villain, and a new name!) and any creator-made or LEGO Group LEGO Islands. Simply select “LEGO Fortnite Brick Life” to start building your new city lifestyle!

item.title: Cladun X3 demo now available in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/cladun-x3-demo-now-available-in-japan

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Custom data can be carried over to the full game.

A demo for Cladun X3 is now available for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch in Japan, Nippon Ichi Software announced.

The demo features the first four dungeons in the game, the random dungeon “Ran-Geon” that changes each time you visit, the random dungeon “Map-Geon” created using a magic map, and customization elements such as character editing, town map creation, background music creation, and more. Custom data from the demo can be carried over to the full game when it launches.

Cladun X3 is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on February 27, 2025 in Japan.

item.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero demo now available in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/phantom-brave-the-lost-hero-demo-now-available-in-japan

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Save data can be carried over to the full game.

A demo for Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero is now available for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch in Japan, Nippon Ichi Software announced.

The demo is playable from the beginning of the game until the second chapter. Save data from the demo can be carried over to the full game when it launches.

Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on January 30, 2025 worldwide, followed by PC via Steam in spring 2025.

item.title: Chained Echoes DLC ‘Ashes of Elrant’ announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/chained-echoes-dlc-ashes-of-elrant-announced

Publisher Deck13 Spotlight and developer Umami Tiger have announced Chained Echoes downloadable content “Ashes of Elrant.” It will launch in 2025.

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via Deck13 Spotlight:

“Ashes of Elrant” takes players to a new land, away from Valandis. It is set right before the final fight of Chained Echoes so you can prepare yourself for meeting your beloved heroes once again. The Clan of the Crimson Wings has to answer a call for help from the land of Elrant. A land where nothing is as it seems.

Get yourself ready for a new playable character—the White Wolf, visit new areas, fight over 40 new monsters and bosses and listen to 15 new tracks by mastermind Eddie Marianukroh. And also grab yourself a fishing rod—you will need it.

Chained Echoes is available now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and GOG.

item.title: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls character trailer – Sosuke Aizen
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/bleach-rebirth-of-souls-character-trailer-sosuke-aizen

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Tamsoft have released a new character trailer for fighting action game Bleach: Rebirth of Souls highlighting playable fighter Sosuke Aizen.

According to his description, Aizen is the proud owner of having Spiritual Pressure that surpasses all Soul Reapers and a general unparalleled power beyond limitation.

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam on March 21, 2025.
